name: Playroll for Playdate
description:
In Playroll for Playdate your main goal is obviously to roll.

Roll the ball with the crank, roll the crank, crank the ball, crank the playdate, you roll the playdate and the playdate rolls you.

The best game to impress your friends who want to discover the wonderful joys of rolling.

Your should give it a try, really!

Please, download and try the game before making any donation or recommending it to your friends, as the screenshot might not be enough to understand the special gameplay.

Note: You need a Playdate console (or simulator) to launch this app.
